paper.title: Extending resolution for model construction
paper.venue: JELIA '90 Proceedings of the European workshop on Logics in AI
paper.abstract: A method is proposed to systematize the simultaneous search for a refutation and Herbrand models of a given conjecture. It is based on an extension of resolution using equational problems and the inference system included in the method is proved to be sound and refutational complete. For some classes of formulae the method is indeed a decision procedure. Some examples of model construction — including one for which other resolution based decision procedures fail to detect satisfiability — are developed in detail.
